Name: Acapulco Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients to emulsify. Add ice, SHAKE again and fine strain into chilled glass.
Nutrition: One serving of Acapulco Daiquiri contains 145 calories
